    23: // _ Route does not exist => return to base
    24: // _ RouteExists()
    25: // _ Data error
    26: // _ Required [element] args
    27: // _ Not a well-formed request
    28: // _ Not authenticated
    29: // _ Authenticated()

    31: // _ MethodAllowed()

    38: ? $def->namespace
    39: : false;
    40: $file = (property_exists($def, 'file'))
    41: ? $def->file
    42: : false;
    43: $line = (property_exists($def, 'line'))
    44: ? $def->line
    45: : false;
    46: $msg = (property_exists($def, 'message'))
    47: ? $def->message
    48: : 'Error';
    49:

    51: if ($line) {
    52: echo $error;
    53: }
